TITLE: Episode 2 - The "Agree With Me If You Want to Remain Tax Free" CNN Equality Town Hall
DESCRIPTION: In Lesbertarian Episode 2, we cover the recent CNN Equality Town Hall, discuss punishing religious institutes for being religious, Ellen DeGeneres makes out with Howard Stern to add to her resume of less than exemplary male role models and talk about the prominence of the LGBT community in Hollywood.
CONTENT: In Lesbertarian Episode 2, we cover the recent CNN Equality Town Hall, discuss punishing religious institutes for being religious, Ellen DeGeneres makes out with Howard Stern to add to her resume of less than exemplary male role models and talk about the prominence of the LGBT community in Hollywood.
